name: QrStructuredAppend
summary: Structured append metadata for multi-symbol QR payloads.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: Index of this symbol in the sequence (1..16).

parameters.name: total
parameters.summary: Total number of symbols in the sequence (1..16).

properties.name: Index
properties.summary: Index of this symbol in the sequence (1..16).

properties.name: Total
properties.summary: Total number of symbols in the sequence (1..16).

properties.name: IsValid
properties.summary: Returns true when the values are within the QR structured-append range.
